retrieval.storage.index

Class ValueStructure

  • java.lang.Object
    • retrieval.storage.index.ValueStructure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class ValueStructure
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class implements a value structure for the index A value structure is map with a visual word B and contains entry [I,NIBT] for each image I that generate NIBT (!=0) patchs which produced B
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • addEntry

        public boolean addEntry(long I,
                        int NIBT)
        Add new entry for image I in this (collection for visual word B), If already exist, increment by NIBT. May occurs a compression of map (configuration option)
        Parameters:
        I - Image I
        NIBT - Number of patchs produced by I for visual word B
